  • Constructor Details

    • MarginallyCleverPreferences

      public MarginallyCleverPreferences​(java.util.prefs.AbstractPreferences parent, java.lang.String name)
      Creates a preference node with the specified parent and the specified name relative to its parent.
      Parameters:
      parent - the parent of this preference node, or null if this is the root.
      name - the name of this preference node, relative to its parent, or ≶tt>""≶/tt> if this is the root.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if ≶tt>name≶/tt> contains a slash (≶tt>'/'≶/tt>), or ≶tt>parent≶/tt> is ≶tt>null≶/tt> and name isn't ≶tt>""≶/tt>.
